name: Killer Roots
description:
Game for Global Game Jam 2023

It's year 2137, the world has succumbed to nuclear annihilation.

Yashkovak, the evil president of PozCITY wants to cut down the last tree on earth.

For this purpose he has created an army of his clones.

You stand in his way! A genetically mutated tree!

Fight with your roots and defeat the clones.

You are the only hope!
